channel.title: Client Won't Start :/
channel.description:
I'm new to everything on here so go easy on me please
I've done everything i'm supposed to do when building a new server but when i go to start the client/server it just stays on the loading screen "'SeverName' Is loading - Please Wait"
Why won't it load :/ :confused:

item.title: Client Won't Start :/
item.dc:creator: @Avsen Avsen
item.description:
@Avsen wrote:

Your most likely running a 562+ client. For this to work, you must have your server up before your client so it is able to ‘connect’. Also, if you haven’t done it already, go to the signlink.java, and check where the cache is loading from and put it there. Most likely C:// (or for Linux ./home/USERNAME/). Also you’ll need to have all the IPs ste to 127.0.0.1, and the ports the same as well.
[/quote]

I deleted all previous Client’s and Sever’s
I am currently attempting to work with Realism 614http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,512733.0.html
The Client loads but I have to change the .no-ip over to my servers name correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Won't Start :/
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Avsen, post:5, topic:433691”]@Kidpaparoach
I’ve tried different server’s/clients in the “cmd” that comes up it’ll say Error_Game_js5connect?

Sorry to be a pain[/quote]

Your most likely running a 562+ client. For this to work, you must have your server up before your client so it is able to ‘connect’. Also, if you haven’t done it already, go to the signlink.java, and check where the cache is loading from and put it there. Most likely C:// (or for Linux ./home/USERNAME/). Also you’ll need to have all the IPs ste to 127.0.0.1, and the ports the same as well.

Read full topic
